hero.subtext: At Ichika's House of Coffee, we only brew the most freshest coffee from all around the world. we also serve pastries such as cupcakes and pies.

about.subtext: You can enjoy and purchase a variety of our products, even Latte-art, dont be shy and ask for more info.

member.name: Ichika
member.quote: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.

member.name: Itsuki
member.quote: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
